channel.title: Can anyone help me add Customs to my server, and Are they Client or Server sided
channel.description:
In my client, i have custom items (the ID's etc in Models), such as the Death Cape.. on one server i'm trying, they work.. but on another, they don't.
I thought the models were all kept in the client.. surely if they're in the client won't they work no matter what the server running is?
Do i need to some how embed those custom items into my server aswell as my client?
Anyone help me.. anything
Anyone had the same problem? :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 30, 2009, 02:51:41 pm[/size][hr]Ps:.. I dont need to know how to create them, i need to know why they arnt loading (being "Null" or saying "NON EXISTING ITEM!" when you wield.. when they work on one server, but not another.
:)

item.title: Can anyone help me add Customs to my server, and Are they Client or Server sided
item.dc:creator: @skinzoskinz skinzoskinz
item.description:
@skinzoskinz wrote:

Well, for example…

if(i == 5000) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[5]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[5]; class8.anInt174 = 3288; class8.anInt181 = 2000; class8.anInt190 = 500; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -6; class8.anInt194 = 1; class8.anInt204 = 14; class8.anInt165 = 3287; class8.anInt200 = 3287; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.anInt199 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Death Cape"; class8.aByteArray178 = "The cape worn by masters of PKing.".getBytes(); }

That is a death cape, and when picked up in BOTH sources, it IS a death cape, However, on one it goes onto the weapon slot… and on the other it works properly…

Any ideas?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 01, 2009, 04:23:52 am[/size][hr]OMG you fixed it!!!

Just one more problem, those all work now because i’ve set them in the item4.java thing… but there isnt a weapon one there it just says “hopefully the rest are weapons” and because of this they don’t work… is there any way to like create a weapon thing in there or add them to somewhere like Item4.java??

Read full topic
item.source: Can anyone help me add Customs to my server, and Are they Client or Server sided

item.title: Can anyone help me add Customs to my server, and Are they Client or Server sided
item.dc:creator: @C4ll3r C4ll3r
item.description:
@C4ll3r wrote:

Hmm adding items first in client is good but u forgot the server sided things: (i dont have a server right now but i THINK how to fix that)

The problem with non-existing weapon is go to:
Item.cfg or Item.Class forgotten :S
And add it there thats the file with all that bonuses of weapons/armour

Then i dont know this for sure

But go to Item4.class
And put your Legs/head whatever in the right spot

And Save and compile

Hope it works…

Read full topic
